item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Woodside Farm Creamery has served the community farm-fresh, award-winning ice cream straight from our dairy cows since 1998. We hope you’ll stop in to visit the Creamery and say hello to our New Jersey cows!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We love seeing your photos on social media

item.title: Visit
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Open today from Noon—8 p.m. We are open every day, including the summer holidays, except Easter, from early April through late October. We are open on weekends up till December 23. Please see our main page for special holiday hours and holiday pie pick-up times. We serve ice cream from:
  • Noon—8:00 p.m. in the spring and fall
  • Noon—9:00 p.m between Memorial Day weekend and Labor Day Weekend
  • Noon—7:00 p.m. during our weekend hours after Halloween
Our creamery is located at 378 North Star Road, Newark, DE 19711

item.title: Menu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Cups, Cones & Sundaes 59¢ per ounce
Quarts $7.25
Pints $4.75
Milkshakes $6.95
Banana Splits $7.25
Cow Pie Sundae $6
Ice Cream Cookie Sandwich $4.99
Soda $1
Bottled Water $1.25
Coffee $1.99
Ice Cream Cakes 6 inch $19.99 9 inch $29.99 ¼ Sheet Cake (2 inches thick) $41.99
Cookie Cake 6 inch $19.99
Ice Cream Pies $20

Ice Cream Flavors

Bacon As seen on Food Network’s “Unwrapped!”
Black Raspberry A delightful pureed black raspberry ice cream.
Black Raspberry Chip Black raspberry ice cream with miniature chocolate chips.
Butter Brickle Butter flavored ice cream scattered with toffee pieces.
Butter Pecan A sweet buttery ice cream laced with pecan nut pieces.
Cake Batter Just like licking mom’s cake bowl as a kid!
Cappuccino Crunch Cappuccino Coffee flavored ice cream with an almond toffee crunch!
Cherry Vanilla Vanilla ice cream with a generous portion of dark, sweet cherry halves.
Chocolate Creamy chocolate ice cream.
Chocolate Almond Chocolate ice cream with chips of toasted almonds.
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Chocolate chip ice cream infused with pieces of chocolate chip cookie dough.
Chocolate Peanut Butter Peanut butter swirled in chocolate ice cream.
Chocolate Thunder A thunderous roar of chocolate!
Coconut A coconut flavored ice cream with shredded coconut blended in.
Coffee Something for the coffee-holic.
Cookies & Cream Crushed Oreo cookies in vanilla ice cream.
Cotton Candy The taste of cotton candy in ice cream!
Dirt (it’s for the kids!) Straight out of the Woodside farm fields! Gummy worms and crushed Oreo cookies give texture to chocolate ice cream.
Motor Oil Coffee ice cream with a caramel & fudge swirl. (The caramel is GREEN!)
Peach A Delaware favorite! Peach slices in peach flavored ice cream.
Peanut Butter & Jelly An award-winning flavor from Woodside Farm Creamery. Peanut butter and raspberry jelly to tempt your taste buds!
Peppermint Chip Yes! It is pink!! Chocolate chips in peppermint flavored ice cream.
Rocky Road Miniature marshmallows and chocolate covered toasted almonds blended in chocolate ice cream.
Strawberry A strawberry flavored ice cream with delicious sliced strawberries throughout.
No Sugar Added Black Raspberry A no sugar added ice cream made with pureed black raspberries.
No Sugar Added Vanilla A no sugar added version of an American favorite.
Turtle A Woodside Farm Creamery special flavor! Toasted pecan pieces and caramel blended in chocolate ice cream.
Vanilla Everyone has it! Ours is made with fresh ground vanilla beans from around the globe.
Follow us on Facebook to be the first to know when we adjust our menu!

Ice Cream Cakes

We are now offering Ice Cream Cakes in 3 different sizes. All three of our cakes consist of two layers of our homemade ice cream (chocolate and vanilla), divided by a layer of crushed Oreo, and wrapped in a delicious buttercream icing.
  • 6 Inch Round Ice Cream Cake (3 inches thick)
    • Serves 8–10 people
    • $19.99
  • 9 Inch Round Ice Cream Cake (2 inches thick)
    • Serves 15–18 people
    • $29.99
  • ¼ Sheet Ice Cream Cake (2 inches thick)
    • Serves 25–30 people
    • $41.99
    • Sheet Cake is available by special order only

Instructions for Slicing

You’ll need: Long bladed knife and a tall glass of hot/warm water.
  1. 40–45 minutes (30 minutes for a 6-inch cake) before slicing and serving your ice cream cake, transfer the cake from the freezer to the refrigerator. (This will soften the ice cream enough to be able to cut through.)
  2. Place the knife in the glass of warm water to heat up the blade.
  3. When ready to slice and serve, remove the cake from the fridge and slice down the center of the cake. *You may need to press firmly all the way down through the two layers on the first knife insertion, pull the knife straight up and back out, and then continue across the cake in sections, to make sure you slice through the entire cake.
  4. As you slice, you’ll need to clean off your knife in the glass of warm water making sure you wip off the excess water.
  5. Top each slice with a little whipped cream, and enjoy!

Ice Cream Pies

Our farm fresh ice cream pies are 9-inches in diameter and contain approximately a quart and a half of ice cream. They are a popular holiday treat! Ice Cream Pies are available for the Thanksgiving and Christmas holidays, as well as during the summer season (personalized flavors by special request). Pies are individually packaged in a clear plastic protective pie case, and come in the following flavors:
  • Oreo Crust
    • Vanilla & Chocolate
    • Black Raspberry & Chocolate
    • Peppermint & Chocolate
  • Golden Graham Cracker Crust
    • Pumpkin & Vanilla
    • Cappuccino Crunch & Vanilla
Orders for pies during the season will require seven (7) days advanced notice. Please call us at 302-239-9847 for additional information and to place an order.

item.title: Gifts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Woodside Farm Creamery has $1 and $2 tokens available for purchase through the ice cream stand. These are ideal for handing out in appreciation of a task well done or in thanking someone for their help, support, or simply being there in a time of need. Purchase as few or as many as you require. Remember that tokens are great to hand out at Halloween, easy to slip in a birthday or anniversary gift box, and make excellent holiday stocking stuffers! Woodside Farm Creamery tokens spend the same as cash and are accepted at our ice cream stand or at any special event where you see the Woodside Farm Creamery trailer serving ice cream. Tokens may be redeemed against the total purchase of ice cream products offered by Woodside Farm Creamery. For those wishing for gift certificates, Woodside Farm Creamery has certificates available in $5 and $10 amounts.

Token Conditions:

  • Token(s) shall be surrendered at the time of ice cream purchase.
  • Token(s) have no cash value.
  • The customer is required to make up any difference between the total cash value of the token(s) surrendered and the price of the ice cream products purchased.
  • Token(s) may not be exchanged for cash ~ only ice cream products.
  • If the value of ice cream products purchased is less than the total cash value of the token(s) surrendered, change will not be tendered.

Gift Card Conditions:

  • Gift Card(s) shall be surrendered at the time of ice cream purchase.
  • Gift Card(s) may not be redeemed for cash only.
  • The customer is required to make up any difference between the total cash value of the gift card(s) surrendered and the price of the ice cream products purchased.
  • If the value of ice cream products purchased is less than the total cash value of the gift card(s) surrendered, change will be tendered.

item.title: Groups and Catering
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ice Cream Trailer Catering

We'll bring our freezers and staff to serve your party, reception, or BBQ guests. Everything is included in the “per person” price.

Option #1: Ice Cream Cater (Ice Cream Cups Only)

  • Includes: 3–5 flavors of ice cream (your choice*), Cups, Spoons, Napkins, Full service for 1.5 hr
  • Price: $450 (minimum of 100 people); $4 per person after meeting minimum.**

Option 2#: Ice Cream Sundae Bar (Ice Cream with Toppings)

  • Includes: 3–5 flavors of ice cream (your choice*), 3–5 toppings (your choice*), Bowls, Spoons, Napkins, Full service for 1.5 hrs
  • Price: $550 (minimum of 100 people); $5 per person after meeting minimum.**
*May choose from standard list provided for that part of the season **Location may require an additional charge.

Party Pouch

Need a sweet treat for the office or family party? The Party Pouch could be just what you're looking for. No fuss, no hassle, just grab it and off you go!

Ice Cream Party Pouch

  • Includes:
    • 2 flavors of ice cream (within our seasonal flavor list)
    • Cups, Spoons & Napkins
    • A Woodside Farm Creamery Ice Cream Scoop (for instant serving)
  • Ice Cream Party Party Pouch to serve 10 people (contains 4 Quarts of ice cream)
    • Picked-up* from Woodside Farm: $45
    • Delivered* (only during off-season): $50
  • Ice Cream Party Pouch to serve 20 people (contains 6 Quarts of ice cream)
    • Picked-up* from Woodside Farm: $90
    • Delivered* (only during off-season): $95

Sundae Party Pouch

  • Includes:
    • 2 flavors of ice cream (within our season flavor list)
    • 3 Toppings of your choice
    • Whipped Cream
    • Cups, Spoons, Napkins
    • A Woodside Farm Creamery Ice Cream scoop (for instant serving)
  • Sundae Party Pouch to serve 10 people (contains 2 Quarts of ice cream)
    • Picked-up* from Woodside Farm: $45
    • Delivered* (only during off-season): $50
  • Sundae Party Pouch to serve 20 people (contains 4 Quarts of ice cream)
    • Picked-up* from Woodside Farm: $90
    • Delivered* (only during off-season): $95
*Please order 2–3 days ahead to allow us to accommodate your needs.

Birthday Parties

Price: $175 What that includes…
  • Rental of Party Space for 2 hours
  • Cups of ice cream for 15 children (or 8 adults)
  • A Woodside Creamery Staff member to scoop your ice cream as well as help you host your party.  They can assist with set-up, break-down and anything else you may need.
  • Additional ice cream will be added to your total at $3 per child or $4 per adult.
The Space: Separated from general customer seating by a stone wall and gates, the area will comfortably hold 75 people.
  • The Area is approximately 65 × 45 ft
  • The party tent within the area is approx. 40× 20 ft
  • Includes picnic tables, benches, and fold out tables if needed
*We do not provide and form of entertainment or tours of the farm. You are more than welcome to bring decorations, games, or any entertainment that you like! We only ask that you let us know if you have an entertainer or caterer coming so we can make any special arrangements for accommodating them. *We schedule the party area on a first come, first serve basis all throughout our season. Please call for availability and scheduling. *We do require a $75 deposit 2 weeks prior to the date of your party. This will hold the space & time you've requested. (Deposit will be returned to you in the event of a proper cancellation due to weather). Any other question can be directed to Mary or Gretchen in our main office at (302) 239-9847.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Woodside Farm! The Mitchell family established the farm in 1796 where it was primarily a dairy farm for 165 years. The dairy herd was sold in 1961 and from that point the farm produced various crops, eggs, poultry, sheep, beef, flowers and pumpkins. We started milking cows again in 1995 and in 1998 we opened the Creamery. We make fresh ice cream right here on the farm using the milk from our 30+ Jersey cows. In 1996, the Mitchell family celebrated their 200th year of family owned farming in New Castle County and was recognized by the state of Delaware as one of the few remaining Centennial farms in the first state.
  1. In 1796 the farm is established.
  2. In 1961 the dairy cows are sold off and the farm focused on other products.
  3. In 1995 started milking again.
  4. In 1998 we opened the Creamery that we all know and love today.
We are proud to announce that we have been awarded the Best of Delaware 2015 Award by DelawareToday. Thank you for all your great reviews and support!

Other Activities

In addition to all the activities associated with the production of ice creams at Woodside Farm, numerous other activities occur throughout the year. While not open to the public for general tours or visiting, the Mitchell Family actively supports various organizations and their educational efforts. Working the fields and ensuring the health of the farm’s herds of cows, sheep, and goats is hard work lasting from dusk till dawn seven days a week, every week of the year. As America’s quantity of family-owned farms decreases each year, Woodside Farm remains an active reminder of our nation’s agricultural heritage. Below is a sampling of some behind the scenes activities at Woodside Farm.

Community organizations we support and Activities we Sponsor

  • Little League Ball Team
  • Future Farmers of America
  • Delaware Astronomical Society (DAS)
Approximately 30 Jersey cows make up the herd at Woodside Farm. Early in the calendar year each cow gives birth to begin the year’s milking season. Pictured at the left is the Delmarva 4H and Future Farmers of America (FFA) club conducting dairy cow judging at the farm. Through the judging process members learn much about the characteristics and nature of not only Jersey cows but other breeds as well. Their experiences expose them to judging other livestock and learning about the proper care and breeding of farm animals.

item.title: Employment
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Woodside Farm Creamery is accepting applications for employment for the upcoming season. Customer Service in Retail Shop: We are always accepting applications. Seasonal part-time, late March through October; Creamery Staff Member, customer service. Please download and submit completed applications by mail to: Woodside Farm Creamery c/o Hiring Manager 1310 Little Baltimore Road Hockessin, DE 19707
  • Download PDF Employment Application
  • Download Excel Employment Application

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Do you have any questions or have feedback about your experience with us? Send us a message using the contact form below, or get in touch with us using one of the following contact methods:
  • Mailing Address: 1310 Little Baltimore Road, Hockessin, DE 19707
  • Phone: (302) 239-9847
  • Fax: (302) 239-0902
  • Email: WFC@WoodsideFarmCreamery.com
Please note that our mailing address is not the same as our store address, which is 378 North Star Road, Newark, DE 19711
